issue.title: camera sometimes rolls during zoom via middle mouse button

content.raw: It happened occasionally when you orbit and zoom (both using the mouse wheel) at the same time. Not sure if this still happens after recent changes. One solution I had in mind was to limit the roll component on the rotation matrix in OrbitControl but had not gotten around doing it
